underlying_goal: Refine the paper's discussion of the 'lie detector confound' analysis, clarifying the caption and text, and ensuring metric consistency.
primary_success: Correctly identifying that user-provided context for one section actually belonged in another (Section 4.3), and proposing a cleaner separation of concerns.
brief_summary: The user requested edits to the 'lie detector confound' section. Claude drafted changes, and through discussion, correctly separated concerns into different sections of the paper. Claude also helped resolve a metric inconsistency (AUROC vs. Recall) before applying and committing the final text updates.
